original_text: Shouldn’t you have had mercy on your fellow servant just as I had on you?’
korean_text: 내가 너를 불쌍히 여김과 같이 너도 네 동료를 불쌍히 여김이 마땅하지 아니하냐 하고

sentences.original_text: Shouldn't you have had mercy on your fellow servant
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 동료 종에게 자비를 베풀지 않았어야 했느냐

sentences.original_text: just as I had on you?
